name: Foundation Stuff
description:
This package collects some structural foundation related nodes. Currently includes: 
* Get Footing Type,
* Footing Type Breaks at Inserts
* Filter Structural Foundations By Kind
contents: Filter Structural Foundations By Kind - Filters a list of structural foundations by their kind (isolated, wall, slab)., Footing Type Breaks At Inserts - Determines whether a list of wall footing types break at inserts in their attached walls, Get Footing Type - Retrieves the footing type for a given (continuous) footing instance
